entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
